list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: extreme tiredness resulting from mental or physical exertion or illness.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: he was nearly dead with fatigue
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: anh ấy đã gần chết với sự mệt mỏi

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: weakness in materials, especially metal, caused by repeated variations of stress.
menial non-military tasks performed by a soldier, sometimes as a punishment.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Chúng tôi đang ở trong nhà bếp mệt mỏi, thưa ngài

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: loose-fitting clothing, typically khaki, olive drab, or camouflaged, worn by soldiers.
cause (someone) to feel tired or exhausted.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: they were fatigued by their journey
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: họ đã mệt mỏi bởi hành trình của họ

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: weaken (a material, especially metal) by repeated variations of stress.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: the nails have become rusted through or fatigued
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Móng tay đã bị rỉ sét xuyên qua hoặc mệt mỏi
